command.wild_adventure.first_load_1: Hi, %s! I'm %s. Thank you for playing this mod!
command.wild_adventure.help.start_info1: 1. There is a coal in bonus chest used to make campfire.
command.wild_adventure.help.start_info2: 2. Campfire will burn out. You have to add %s into it.
command.wild_adventure.help.start_info3: 3. Water has to be boiled by campfire to drink.
